scripts.name: Laravel Multi-Vendor Marketplace
scripts.shortDescription: Complete multi-vendor marketplace solution built with Laravel
scripts.description: Complete multi-vendor marketplace solution built with Laravel. Perfect for creating online marketplaces where multiple vendors can sell their products. Includes vendor management, product management, order processing, payment integration, and more.

scripts.name: PHP Job Portal Script
scripts.shortDescription: Professional job portal with employer and candidate management
scripts.description: Professional job portal with employer and candidate management. Features include job posting, candidate search, resume management, application tracking, employer dashboard, candidate dashboard, and advanced filtering options.

scripts.name: WordPress Business Theme
scripts.shortDescription: Modern WordPress theme for business websites
scripts.description: Modern WordPress theme for business websites. Fully responsive design with drag-and-drop page builder, multiple homepage layouts, WooCommerce ready, SEO optimized, and includes premium plugins.

scripts.name: Laravel SaaS Application
scripts.shortDescription: Complete SaaS platform with subscription management
scripts.description: Complete SaaS platform with subscription management, multi-tenancy support, billing integration, user management, and admin dashboard. Perfect for building subscription-based applications.

scripts.name: PHP Learning Management System
scripts.shortDescription: Complete LMS for online courses and training
scripts.description: Complete Learning Management System for online courses and training. Features include course creation, student enrollment, progress tracking, quizzes, certificates, and instructor dashboard.

defaultPlans.name: Standard Installation
defaultPlans.description: Most popular choice with essential features
